Generated Narrative: SearchParameter AllergyIntolerance-patient.given

AllergyIntolerancePatientGivenNameSearchParameter

Parameter patient.given:string

Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?patient.given={givenName}

ResourceAllergyIntolerance
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesAllergyIntolerance
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: AllergyIntolerancePatientGivenNameSearchParameter
